padding--t-none.title: No top padding
padding--t-none.description: Removes all padding from the top.

padding--t-xs.title: Tiny top padding
padding--t-xs.description: Adds a tiny amount of padding to the top.

padding--t-sm.title: Small top padding
padding--t-sm.description: Adds a small amount of padding to the top.

padding--t-md.title: Medium top padding
padding--t-md.description: Adds a medium amount of padding to the top.

padding--t-lg.title: Large top padding
padding--t-lg.description: Adds a large amount of padding to the top.

padding--t-xl.title: Extra-large top padding
padding--t-xl.description: Adds an extra-large amount of padding to the top.

padding--t-xxl.title: Double-extra-large top padding
padding--t-xxl.description: Adds a double-extra-large amount of padding to the top.
